patthana15.72:1.1: Araṇaṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.72:2.1: Saraṇaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.72:3.1: Araṇaṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
